articles.title: Sacked Catalan leader 'not seeking asylum'
articles.description: Carles Puigdemont says he and several colleagues went to Belgium for their safety and freedom.

articles.title: Uncles convicted of 10-year-old's rape
articles.description: The girl was raped by two uncles and the second uncle's DNA matched her baby's.

articles.description: The president says his former adviser George Papadopoulos was a "low level volunteer" and "liar".

articles.title: Doubts over US sailors' survival story
articles.description: The US Coast Guard says that neither Jennifer Appel nor Tasha Fuiava used their emergency beacon.

articles.description: As a special religious service takes place, here's what you need to know about Tuesday's anniversary events.

articles.title: Kelly: 'Lack of compromise' brought Civil War
articles.description: President Trump's chief of staff General John Kelly was speaking to Fox News when he made the remarks.

articles.title: Special Emmy award for Spacey withdrawn

articles.title: Refugees 'scared' to leave Australia camp
articles.description: Men held by Australia in a centre due to be closed in Papua New Guinea say they fear for their lives.

articles.title: Vegas shooting survivors die in car crash
